author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR modernizes HcalDbProducer (as part of #26748) by
- moving the contents of the header to the source file
- using ESGetToken
- replacing repeated patterns with generic functions that take advantage of the ESGetToken declarations

I took the liberty of modifying a bit the format of the optional printouts for some products in order to keep the overall structure generic (and thus deducing information from types as much as possible).

#### PR validation:

Limited matrix runs, no changes expected.
title: Modernize HcalDbProducer
